name: Super Monsters Battle Arena
description:
Welcome to Super Monsters Battle Arena !

Super Monsters Battle Arena is a 2 player arcade game where you need to survive bullet hell waves.

Each player controls a demon that needs to dodge bullets, the first one to get hit loses.

The game is made to be played with Xbox controllers, Switch Pro Controller and Keyboard.

Credits

Music named Good Morning Doctor Weird by https://soundimage.org/looping-music/
